name: Hooligan Life Simulator
description:
[EARLY DEVELOPMENT]

Hello, thank you for your interest and visiting this page.

The game is about the poor enviroment living and a little bit of sarcastic view on our every day world. So if you want to change yourself into a Mafia Boss or a one who gives orders to your subordinates, then try this out.

Requirements:

.NET Framework and a computer that will handle it!

In-Game possibilities:

- Build your small Hooligan Empire under your command

- Support local selling points with stuff made by your cookers

- Deal and get money

- Steal from people in EasyGoldArea aka. Hooligans Paradise :)

Please feel free to submit your ideas and other things which should be included in the game.

Hope you will like it!

I need some money to push the development ahead so if you will be so kind support my work :D
